summary.title: SUMMARY
summary.description2: A Full Stack Developer with over 12 years years of experience developing software, passionate about programming, and new technologies.
summary.description: A Full-Stack Engineer with more than 12 years of experience in the software industry. I have a lot of experience in Javascript and Typescript technologies like Vue, Node and NestJS. I love working with teams around the world and learning about new technologies and cultures

items.companyDescripcion: A subsidiary of FPT Corporation – the leading ICT Group in Asia, FPT Software is a global technology and IT services provider with headquarter in Vietnam.
items.descripcion: Tech Lead for a startup in the USA.
responsibilities: Support the team members.
Delegate tasks to the team.
Evaluate risks in the new developments.
Define new technologies and ensure code quality.
Build new features using Vuejs y Nodejs.

items.companyDescripcion: A subsidiary of FPT Corporation – the leading ICT Group in Asia, FPT Software is a global technology and IT services provider with headquarter in Vietnam.
items.descripcion: Full-Stack Engineer for an international company in USA.
responsibilities: Add new features using Angular 12 and Nodejs.
Define the structure and components for the project, making sure they are reusable.
Build microservices using Nestjs.
Implemented unit tests using Jest.

items.companyDescripcion: Perficient is expanding its software development and delivery services with the acquisition of SMEDIX, Inc. a healthcare software engineering firm based in San Diego, California, with a location in Romania. We’re thrilled to welcome nearly 175 new colleagues to the Perficient team!
items.descripcion: Full-Stack Engineer for an international project in Canada.
responsibilities: Develop and maintenance of new releases using Angular 9 and Nodejs.
Define the structure and components for the project, making sure they are reusable.
Build microservices using express.
Implemented unit tests using Jest.
Deployed on AWS using CI and CD with Jenkins.
Full Stack Developer - Bancolombia (Mar 2018 - Aug 2019)
Full Stack Developer - Ingeneo S.A.S (Jun 2017 - Mar 2018)
Project Engineer - Pragma S.A. (Aug 2014 - Jun 2017)
Full Stack Developer - Metropolitana University (Aug 2012 - Aug 2014)
